children.name: Achomi Music
children.description: Musical traditions of the Achomi people, an Iranian people native to the Persian Gulf coast.

children.name: Bandari
children.description: Iranian dance music, often festive and energetic and set in 6/8, that traditionally makes primary use of Iranian bagpipes (ney-anbƒÅn).

children.name: Koche bazari
children.description: Style of popular music that combines traditional elements of Iranian music with upbeat rhythms & instrumentation, humorous/socially relevant lyrics, and influence from Arabic Music.

children.name: Persian Classical Music
children.description: Traditional art music of the Persian civilization.

children.name: Persian Folk Music
children.description: Traditional Folk Music of the Persian people.

children.name: Persian Pop
children.description: Hybrid of Iranian and Persian-language popular music with Western instruments such as the guitar, drum kit, and synthesizer.
